title: Synthetic Biology Fundamentals: Principles of Cell-Specific Gene Expression Design (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic molecular biology and foundational understanding of gene expression regulation
context.additional_context: Short-Intensive Mobile Learning for Science Education Competency Enhancement Targeting Preservice Teachers and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: They can explain the core principles of cell-specific gene expression in synthetic biology.
They can systematically describe the step-by-step process of designing artificial enhancers using AI-based predictive models.
They can interpret the correlation between transcription factor expression and enhancer activity at the single-cell level through experimental data analysis methods.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
